title: Perfect Hard-Boiled Eggs
method: Step 2: Combine salt, vinegar, and water in a large pot, and bring to a boil over high heat.
Step 3: Add eggs one at a time, being careful not to crack them. Reduce the heat to a gentle boil, and cook for 14 minutes.

Step 4: Once eggs have cooked, remove them from the hot water, and place into a container of ice water or cold, running water. Cool completely, about 15 minutes. Store in the refrigerator up to 1 week.
